message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. As we start our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $900000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's worth to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $850000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm proposing $725000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $725000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer $775000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your latest offer, so I'm proposing $762500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
